title: Educational Design Based on Big Data-AI Convergence Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Real-time online education conducted in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment, where most learners do not own PCs.

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental principles of big data analysis and present educational application examples.
Learners can practice using AI-based educational tools and apply them to personalized learning pathways.
Learners can analyze ethical issues arising in convergent technology environments and propose alternatives.

resources: Basic AI Education Tools (e.g., Teachable Machine)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
